popover.primary: A mastery path focused on hindering your enemies.
A mastery path focused on dealing damage to one enemy with the help of your lion.
A mastery path focused on dealing damage to multiple enemies.

data.name: Axe Toss
data.description: You fling a throwing axe at your target, dealing X physical damage.

data.name: Baiting Strike
data.description: An attack which momentarily distracts your enemy, dealing X physical damage to them. Your targeted groupmate, or your War Lion if you do not have one, will cause 25% less hatred in all enemy monsters for 5 seconds.

data.name: Bend the Winds
data.description: You gain a 300 unique bonus to elemental resistance. Gain a 169 unique bonus to corporeal an spiritual resistance.

data.name: Blade And Claw
data.description: Deals 800 damage to all enemies within 30 feet of both you and your War Lion.

data.name: Blindside
data.description: You attack your enemy at a vulnerable spot, dealing X physical damage immediately and inflicting them with a curse which deals an additional Y physical damage over 10 seconds.

data.name: Blindsided!
data.description: Blindside will now cost 20 AP and also disorient your victim for 10 seconds, causing all of their abilities to take an additional 50% to build up.

data.name: Broad Swings
data.description: All of your attacks for the next 10 seconds will strike up to 2 additional enemies within 25 feet in front of you.

data.name: Brutal Pounce
data.description:
You command your pet to attack without mercy! Your War Lion's next attack within 20 seconds will deal an additional X physical damage and will knock down its victim for 3 seconds.

This ability requires the tactic Full-Fledged Lion in order to be used.

data.name: Brute Force
data.description: You gain a 160 unique bonus to strength.

data.name: Bypass Defenses
data.description: You bolster yourself for 10 seconds, allowing you to bypass the defenses of an enemy keep's postern door, porting you inside.

data.name: Call War Lion
data.description: You call your tamed War Lion to come forth and fight with you. Your War Lion will receive 50% of all healing you receive as long as it is within 30 feet of you. Your War Lion gains 100% of your stats from items.

data.name: Centuries of Training
data.description: Upon striking a target with a direct damage ability there is a 25% chance to inflict an additional X spirit damage over 3 seconds.

data.name: Charge!
data.description: You and your War Lion charge into the thick of battle, increasing your movement speed by 50 for 7 seconds. If you or your War Lion use any abilities, this effect will immediately end.

data.name: Cleave Limb
data.description: A sundering blow which deals X physical damage and inflicts your victim with a curse which reduces their movement speed by 40% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Close Bond
data.description: You gain an additional 50 morale every 5 seconds as long as you have an active War Lion. If your War Lion ever dies, however, you will lose 600 morale.

data.name: Menace
data.description: Enemy monsters will hate you 100% more than normal on all attacks.

data.name: Confusing Movements
data.description: Concentrating on your perceived movements, you will be able to dodge and parry all attacks against you for 7 seconds.

data.name: Coordinated Strike
data.description: You and your War Lion attack as a pack, ravaging your enemies. You strike your target for X physical damage, and your pet strikes its target for increased physical damage. If you are within 35 feet of your pet's target, you will also strike that enemy for X physical damage, and likewise, if your pet is within 35 feet of your target, it will also strike your enemy for increased physical damage as well.

data.name: Cull The Weak
data.description: A ruthless attack which deals X physical damage and will almost always deal critical damage.

data.name: Deafening Roar
data.description: Echoing Roar will now deal X spirit damage to all targets over 10seconds.

data.name: Discerning Offense
data.description: Your attacks have a 10% reduced chance to be defended against.

data.name: Dominance
data.description: Deals 1800 damage to your target, and heals you for 50% of the damage done.

data.name: Echoing Roar
data.description: You unleash a blasting shout, interrupting any enemies 30 feet of you and inflict a curse which causes X spirit damage over 10 seconds to all affected enemies.

data.name: Ensnare
data.description: Deals 300 damage to your target, and roots them in place for 10 seconds.

data.name: Feline Grace
data.description: Your training and Elven grace allows you to remove all roots and snares from yourself and your War Lion. For the next 10 seconds, roots and snares will have no effect on you or your War Lion.

data.name: Fetch!
data.description: You command your War Lion to toss its target through the air, knocking them closer to you.

data.name: Fey Illusion
data.description: You invoke a minor bit of Elven power and attack your target with a befuddling strike, dealing X physical damage. The enemies attack speed is reduced by 50% for the next 10 seconds. Enemy monsters will become confused and will believe that your selected groupmate, or your War Lion if you do not have one, struck the blow.

data.name: Ethereal Cleave
data.description: With a swing of your axe, you project a wave of ethereal energy forward, inflicting all enemies 40 feet in front of you with a curse which inflicts X spirit damage over 10s and reduces their initiative by (rank * 2) and weapon skill by (rank * 3).

data.name: Flanking
data.description: All of your attacks deal 15% more damage when you strike an enemy from the sides or rear.

data.name: Flashing Claws
data.description: Increases the chance to parry attacks by 10% for both you and your pet, as long as you have a pet active.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Flying Axe
data.description: Deals 1200 damage to all enemies in front of you, up to 65 feet away.

data.name: Force of Will
data.description: You stare down your opponent, draining 200 of their Action Points into yourself, and reducing their Strength by 160 for 30 seconds.

data.name: Force Opportunity
data.description: You strike at your enemy with a brutal attack which causes X physical damage. The victim takes a (40 * rank) ability penalty to armor for 10s.

data.name: Frenzied Slaughter
data.description: All of your abilities will cost 25% fewer action points, cool down 50% faster, and deal 20% more damage for 7 seconds.

data.name: Full-Fledged Lion
data.description: Extensive training has made your War Lion more potent in combat. Your War Lion has 50% increased movement speed and attack speed.

data.name: Greataxe Slam
data.description: You slam your axe into the ground, generating a wave of force which knocks down all enemies 25 feet in front of you for 2 seconds, and inflicts x physical damage

data.name: Hack
data.description: A brutal chop at your enemy which deals X physical damage and an additional x physical damage over 10 seconds This effect stacks up to 3 times.

data.name: Hack Them Down
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, you will cause all of their abilities to cost 50% more action points for 5s.

data.name: Intense Focus
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you and your War Lion will deal 25% more damage.

data.name: Jagged Edge
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy they will begin to bleed, suffering additional 609 corporeal damage over 9 seconds.

data.name: Joy of the Hunt
data.description: Your War Lion is fully healed, and all group members within 100 feet instantly gain 250 action points.

data.name: Kill Command
data.description:
You command your War Lion to strike at the opponent's weakest spot. You War Lion will deal additional physical damage and ignore all armor for this strike.

This ability requires the tactic Full-fledged Lion in order to be used.

data.name: Kurnous's Chosen
data.description: The negative effects of Nature's Bond are removed. In addition, whiles under the effects of Nature's Bond, your war lion will restore 20% of it's maximum health if it drops below 30% health consuming the effect of Nature's Bond.

data.name: Leonine Frenzy
data.description: At your command, your War Lion goes berserk with a killing frenzy for the next 10 seconds! Your War Lion will gain 50% increased critical damage and its abilities will not go on cooldown when used.

data.name: Lionheart
data.description: Lion's Fury no longer requires that the target be cursed, costs 15 fewer action points, and deals X spirit damage.

data.name: Lion's Fury
data.description: You draw upon your mystical Elven heritage and furiously attack your target, dealing X spirit damage.

data.name: Merciless Blows
data.description: Sundering Chop and Fey Illusion will cause the next Coordinated Strike used within 6 seconds to deal 10% more damage. This effect stacks up to 3x and is removed by Coordinated Strike and Pounce.

data.name: Nature's Bond
data.description:
Your bond with yout War Lion is improved over the next 15 seconds.
Positive Effects - Your War Lion is healed for 50% of its maximum health and takes 25% less damage over the duration.
Negative Effects - Your War Lion will deal 25% less damage and you will take 20% increased damage over the duration. This effect is removed in you War Lion dies.

data.name: Pack Assault
data.description: A feral attack which deals X physical damage and inspires your groupmates to hunt as a pack. Within the next 5 seconds, each group member within 100 feet will deal an additional X physical damage with their next attack.

data.name: Pack Synergy
data.description: You hone the edge of your axe to a keen sharpness, causing all of your critical hits to deal an additional 50% bonus damage

data.name: Pounce
data.note:
You cannot perform this action while rooted
You cannot perform this action while stunned
data.description: You pounce forwards, leaping towards your target and causing X physical damage when you land. Your movement speed will be subsequently increased by 35% for 3 seconds. This speed increase will be dismissed if you use any ability. This ability cannot be used while you are in the air or Trained Traditionally

data.name: Practised Swing
data.description: Increases your autoattack speed by 50%.

data.name: Rampage
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, all of your abilities will cool down immediately and not cost any action points. This will also affect your War Lion as well.

data.name: Relentless Assault
data.description: A prolonged fervor that grants 10 action points a second to everyone in your group within 100 feet of you for 10 seconds.

data.name: Revenge!
data.description: If your War Lion is killed, you will go into a rage and deal 50% more damage for 10 seconds.

data.name: Riposte
data.description: Each time you parry an enemy's attack, you will strike them back for X physical damage which they can not prevent.

data.name: Sever Nerve
data.description: A directed strike that inflicts 1200 damage to your target.

data.name: Shattering Blow
data.description: A powerful attack which shatters your enemy's bones, inflicting a Curse which deals X physical damage over 10 seconds and causes the target to take a (3 * rank) ability penalty to strength.

data.name: Slash Command
data.description:
You command your War Lion to swipe in front of it dealing physical damage to all targets within 25ft.

Requires Trained to Hunt.

data.name: Slashing Blade
data.description: A broad sweep of your axe which deals X physical damage to all enemies in front of you, up to 25 feet away.

data.name: Spirit Strike
data.description: All of your abilities in the Path of the Guardsman bypass 50% armor or spirit resistance.

data.name: Subtlety
data.description: Enemy monsters will hate you 25% less than normal.

data.name: Submission
data.description:
You cower submissively, causing all enemies within 30 feet to hate you less and deal only 50% damage to you for 5 seconds. For the next 5 seconds, you will cause 25% less hate in all enemy monsters.
If you attack anyone that you've Detaunted, the effect will immediately fade from them.

data.name: Sundering Chop
data.description:
A powerful axe chop which deals X physical damage.

If you are behind the enemy, then this attack will ignore (9 + 24.5 * rank) armor

data.name: Tearing Blade
data.description: Slashing Blade and Sundering Chop will now cause an additional X physical damage over 3 seconds.

data.name: Thin The Herd
data.description: You call forth a surge of power as you attack your enemy, dealing X physical damage and causing all healing that they use within the next 10 seconds to become 50% as effective.

data.name: Throat Bite
data.description: You command your pet to go for the throat! Your War Lion's next attack within 20 seconds will deal additional physical damage and will silence its victim, making them unable to use magic for 4 seconds.

data.name: Trained To Hunt
data.description:
You train your lion for the long hunt. Your lion gains +25% initiative, +50% toughness, +50% armor/resistances, -25% weapon skill, and +100% threat generation. Your War Lion gains the ability to snare and debilitate your enemies.

Everytime you deal damage, you have a 10% chance to apply a stack of Hunter's Strike healing you and your pet over 10 seconds. This stacks 10 times.

data.name: Trained To Kill
data.description:
You train your pet to fight ferociously. Your lion gains +100% Weapon Skill, -33% wounds, and generates 25% less hatred in monsters. Your War Lion gains abilities that deal higher amounts of damage.

You will gain 5% critical chance as long as your lion is attacking the enemy.

data.name: Trained Traditionally
data.description: You are trained in the traditional arts of protecting the Pheonix King. You may not summon a white lion, you may not pounce, your superior training increases all damage you deal by 25%, and your connection to the Pheonix King causes all of your Path of Guardsman abilities to deal spirit damage.

data.name: Whirling Axe
data.description: You rapidly spin your axe around for up to 3 seconds, dealing X physical damage twice a second to all enemies within 30 feet. This ability will end if you lose your concentration or run out of action points.
